document_data.name: Thear Chessar
document_data.mainbody: '''Thear Chessar''' ({{Pronounce|THEER|CHESS|ar|refs=}}) was a female [[shield dwarf]] [[rogue]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Description: Thear was a dwarf of [[Clan Stoneshaft]]. Her appearance as a typical dwarf allowed her to be overlooked by pursuers.
document_data.Personality: Thear was very clever, using her image as a dwarf to avoid suspicion. She thieved mostly for the fun and danger of the situation. She kept her thieving under control in order to avoid being discovered.
document_data.Relations: She became close to [[Paerro]] a pickpocket that struggled to find his way in the big city.
